description: This file defines the main Dashboard React component for a business analytics dashboard application. It manages state for theme toggling, tab navigation via URL hash, and sample data for metrics and charts. It renders a structured layout including sidebar, top bar, metrics, and charts with interactivity and dynamic content.

methods.name: navigateTab
methods.description: Updates the selected tab state and history hash to navigate between sections without full page reload.

methods.name: handleThemeToggle
methods.description: Toggles between light and dark themes and updates local storage and data-theme attribute.

methods.name: renderOverview
methods.description: Renders the overview tab content, including metrics and charts.

methods.name: renderSales
methods.description: Renders the sales-specific content including a bar chart of recent sales.

methods.name: renderRevenue
methods.description: Renders revenue section with a pie chart of revenue categories.

methods.name: renderSettings
methods.description: Displays settings including theme toggle button.

methods.name: renderTabContent
methods.description: Returns the appropriate content component based on the current selected tab.
